vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐοδ-όω,
help on the way, with dative person, σφῷν δ᾽ εὐοδοίη Ζεύς [Refs 5th c.BC+]: with accusative person, [LXX+4th c.BC+]
__2 passive, have a prosperous journey, [LXX+NT]; of things, prosper, be successful, ὡς Κλεομένεϊ εὐωδώθη τὸ πρῆγμα see reading in [Refs 5th c.BC+]; θησαυρίζων ὅ τι ἂν εὐοδῶται, ={εὐπορῇ}, [NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: (passive) to get along with; to have a way opened; to prosper, get along well
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to get along with; to have a way opened; to prosper, get along well
to give a prosperous journey; cause to prosper, or be successful; passive to have a prosperous journey, to succeed in a journey, have a way opened Rom. 1:10; metaphorically to be furthered, to prosper, temporally or spiritually, 1Cor. 16:2; 3Jn. 2 (2x)*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: irle bien (a uno mismo), prosperar ; ganar (dinero) ; ser posible (que uno haga algo)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 字意: 被帶領至康莊大道
3) 興盛, 成功
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 字意: 被带领至康庄大道
3) 兴盛, 成功
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: để có một hành trình thịnh vượng; được thạnh vượng; được thịnh vượng. εὖ (G2095) + ὁδός (G3598)
